Sentencas: In order to investigate the exergy effects of NH3, H2, and natural gas on the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and engine hybrid system, a SOFC-HCCI hybrid system model incorporating exhaust gas energy recycling technology is designed and established.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: In this study, the effects of fuel type, fuel flow rate, equivalence ratio, and steam-fuel ratio on the system exergy efficiency are analyzed.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Besides, the exergy loss under different fuels is discussed.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Eventually, operating parameters are optimized using the particle swarm optimization algorithm.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Results indicate that the system exergy efficiency improves with the fuel flow rate increasing, first raises and then declines with the equivalence ratio increasing, and decreases with the steam-fuel ratio increasing.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: When NH3, H2, and natural gas are used as fuels, the highest exergy efficiency is 56.3 %, 60.2 %, and 56.4 %, respectively.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The system exergy efficiency when H2 is used as fuel is higher than that of NH3 and natural gas at all operating conditions.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The exergy destruction analysis results show that the total exergy destruction in the heat exchanger accounts for the largest proportion of 20.2 % when using NH3.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: The total absolute exergy destruction of the system is the largest when natural gas is used as fuel.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Exergy losses of the system mainly occur in the SOFC module and the engine module, and relative exergy losses are both more than 30 %.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system

Sentencas: Optimization results indicate that the system has a high exergy efficiency when the equivalence ratio is near 1.
Titulo: Exergy analysis and parameters optimization for zero-carbon/low-carbon fuels on SOFC-engine hybrid system
